Question: On Air Platform CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FiiO

Product 1: R9 Desktop Streamer and Headphone Amp/DAC

 - 64GB of onboard storage
 - HDMI ARC and optical connections
 - 2.4Ghz / 5Ghz Wi-Fi and AirPlay compatibility
Summary_cn:
FiiO

产品1：R9 台式电流播放器和耳机放大器/DAC

- HDMI ARC 和光纤连接
- 2.4Ghz / 5Ghz Wi-Fi 和 AirPlay 兼容
